abstract_ssm: These invoices, dated 1849, pertain to the opening and grading of streets in the Gowanus area of Brooklyn between Gowanus Ditch and Hamilton Avenue. Gowanus Ditch was a small channel connecting the Atlantic Basin to the Gowanus Canal. The invoices were submitted to the City of Brooklyn by James Ashfield, the contractor who completed the work.
subject_ssm: Roads |z New York (State) |z Kings County |x Design and construction

subject_sim: Roads -- New York (State) -- Kings County -- Design and construction
